YouTube Videos

  • Learn how to insert a YouTube video into a new HTML page
    1. Open the source code editor on this page.
    2. Copy the code for the full div container below. It begins with <div class="video-container mb-4"> and contains the <iframe> embed code for the video below.
    3. Paste that code into a new HTML page.
    4. To get a new embed code from YouTube:
      1. Go to the YouTube video in YouTube.
      2. DO NOT use the YouTube page URL. Instead, click "Share", then "Embed".
      3. Copy the embed code in the dialog box that appears.
    5. Return to your new HTML page.
    6. Paste the embed code from YouTube in place of the entire <iframe> code found in this sample page. DO NOT paste over the <div> container code. Paste the new <iframe> code into that container.
    7. Important: Delete the width and height attributes from the embed code (width="560" height="315").
    8. Click save.
